main.title: Developing children's thinking through programming
main.description: An international online programming school for children aged 9 to 17

list.name: Emma
list.title: Young prodigy Emma
list.text: Emma started with us at the age of 10 with no coding experience. Through dedicated learning and guidance from our instructors, she developed her skills and participated in coding competitions. Today, she is a recognized young coder and has won several awards for her innovative projects

list.name: Max
list.title: Mobile game developer Max
list.text: Max joined our school when he was 15 years old. With a passion for game development, he immersed himself in our curriculum, learning various programming languages and techniques. After completing our program, Max successfully published his own mobile game, which has garnered thousands of downloads and positive reviews.

list.name: Sarah
list.title: Sarah's Story: The Future with Artificial Intelligence
list.text: Sarah began her programming journey with us at the age of 14. She demonstrated exceptional problem-solving abilities and a keen interest in artificial intelligence. With the support of our experienced teachers, Sarah delved into advanced AI concepts and applied her knowledge to develop a chatbot that assists in customer service for a local business. Her project received recognition and was adopted by several other companies

benefits.title: What will a child get at our school?

list.title: Skills development
list.description: Programming classes develop logical thinking and creativity

list.title: Beneficial hobby
list.description: Instead of playing computer games and spending time on social media, your child will develop their abilities

list.title: Promising profession
list.description: Our graduates are in demand and have good earning potential

programs.title: Courses
programs.description: You can start learning at any age and with any level of knowledge! We will tailor a schedule for you on any convenient day and time!

list.title:
Introduction to Programming
For kids 9-11 years old
list.description: Course objective: Learn the basics of programming and develop a child's thinking skills
programPoints: Creating programs and games using visual blocks in Scratch
Solving interesting tasks ang competing in quick thinking challenges

list.title:
Creating apps and games in Python
For kids 12-14 years old
list.description: Course Objective: Learn to solve complex tasks and create programs
programPoints: Creating algorithms in mature programming languages like Python and JavaScript
Introduction to variables, loops, logical conditions, functions, and other fundamentals
Practical lessons where students create applications, games, and run them on their own computers

list.title:
Website development and business solutions
For children 14-17 years old
list.description: Course objective: Create a large-scale graduation project
programPoints: Working with databases and learning SQL
Basics of robust code and testing

list.title: Focus on Practice
list.description: Knowledge is effectively assimilated through a large amount of hands-on practice in our classes. Children maintain their interest and enhance their thinking skills through engaging tasks

list.title: Unique methodologies
list.description: The curriculum is designed by experienced programmers who have solved real-world business problems. As a result, our students become sought-after professionals in top IT companies

list.title: Online learning
list.description: It's convenient since there's no need to travel anywhere. Kids can study from anywhere, just needing a computer or laptop. They learn in small groups, constantly interacting with the teacher. They communicate, compete, and achieve new victories together

list.title: Final project
list.description: At the end of the program, students not only receive a diploma but also create a final project. Graduates transform their acquired knowledge into a project that can be included in their portfolio for college admissions or job applications

list.review:
We are thrilled with the progress our child has made since enrolling in Upkid Programming School.
The curriculum is well-structured, and the teachers are highly knowledgeable and dedicated

Our son has developed a strong foundation in programming and has gained confidence in their abilities. The online format allows for flexibility and personalized attention, ensuring that our child receives the support they need

We highly recommend Upkid to other parents looking to nurture their child's programming skills

As a parent, I initially had reservations about online education for my child. However, Upkid School has completely changed my perspective. The teachers are fantastic at creating an engaging and interactive learning environment. They go above and beyond to ensure that each student understands the concepts thoroughly. Upkid has exceeded our expectations, and we are grateful for the quality educationour child is receiving

Upkid has been an amazing experience for my child! The interactive online classes have helped my child develop strong programming skills while having fun. The teachers are knowledgeable, patient, and create a supportive learning environment. My child looks forward to every class. I highly recommend Upkid to any parent!

list.title: How often are the classes held and how long do they last?
list.answer: Classes are held once a week for about an hour or an hour and a half

list.title: How many students are in a group?
list.answer: On average, there are about ten students in a group.

list.title: Is any certificate issued at the end of course?
list.answer: Yes, graduates of UpKid school receive a diploma of completion of the online programming school. The diploma indicates the completed program.

list.title: Do I need a computer and what kind of computer?
list.answer: Yes, any computer or laptop will do. The operating system and version are not so important. A microphone and headphones will also be needed, but laptops usually have them built-in. However, it would be more comfortable for the child to have a regular headset. A webcam is not necessary, but the teachers have one

list.title: What happens if a child misses a class?
list.answer: The teacher will have a separate session with the child to cover the missed material

list.title: Where are you located?
list.answer: We are an online school, and we operate wherever there is an internet connection. Online learning has proven its effectiveness and is not inferior to in-person classes. Children can see and hear the teacher, who explains the material on an electronic board. Students communicate with each other in the group. The teacher can also connect to the child's desktop to check their problem-solving and assist if they are having any difficulties
